content.text: Learn how to create a contact form with CSS.
content.html: Learn how to create a contact form with CSS.

content.text: How To Create a Contact Form
Use a <form> element to process the input. You can learn more about this in our PHP tutorial. Then add inputs (with a matching label) for each field:
content.html: Use a <form> element to process the input. You can learn more about this in our PHP tutorial. Then add inputs (with a matching label) for each field:

syntaxHighlighting.text:
<input type="text" 
  id="lname" name="lastname" placeholder="Your last name..">

type="text" 
  id="lname" name="lastname" placeholder="Your last name.."

syntax_highlighting.text:
<input type="text" 
  id="lname" name="lastname" placeholder="Your last name..">

type="text" 
  id="lname" name="lastname" placeholder="Your last name.."

content.code_html:
<div class="container">
  <form action="action_page.php">

    <label for="fname">First Name</label>
    <input type="text" id="fname" name="firstname" placeholder="Your name..">

    <label for="lname">Last Name</label>
    <input type="text" id="lname" name="lastname" placeholder="Your last name..">

    <label for="country">Country</label>
    <select id="country" name="country">
      <option value="australia">Australia</option>
      <option value="canada">Canada</option>
      <option value="usa">USA</option>
    </select>

    <label for="subject">Subject</label>
    <textarea id="subject" name="subject" placeholder="Write something.." style="height:200px"></textarea>

    <input type="submit" value="Submit">

  </form>
</div>

  id="lname" name="lastname" placeholder="Your last name.."

syntax_highlighting.text: /* Style inputs with type="text", select elements and textareas */
/* Make sure that padding and width stays in place */

: vertical /* Allow the user 
  to vertically resize the textarea (not horizontally) */

/* Allow the user 
  to vertically resize the textarea (not horizontally) */
/* Style the submit button with a specific background color etc */

/* When moving the mouse over the submit button, 
  add a darker green color */

/* Add a background color and some 
  padding around the form */

content.code_html:
/* Style inputs with type="text", select elements and textareas */
input[type=text], select, textarea {
  width: 100%; /* Full width */
  padding: 12px; /* Some padding */ 
  border: 1px solid #ccc; /* Gray border */
  border-radius: 4px; /* Rounded borders */
  box-sizing: border-box; /* Make sure that padding and width stays in place */
  margin-top: 6px; /* Add a top margin */
  margin-bottom: 16px; /* Bottom margin */
  resize: vertical /* Allow the user to vertically resize the textarea (not horizontally) */
}

/* Style the submit button with a specific background color etc */
input[type=submit] {
  background-color: #04AA6D;
  color: white;
  padding: 12px 20px;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 4px;
  cursor: pointer;
}

/* When moving the mouse over the submit button, add a darker green color */
input[type=submit]:hover {
  background-color: #45a049;
}

/* Add a background color and some padding around the form */
.container {
  border-radius: 5px;
  background-color: #f2f2f2;
  padding: 20px;
}
